speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Jake from XYZ Collections. Is this John?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is John. How can I help you?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling about your overdue account. You’re really behind on your payments, you know that?

speaker: Customer
text: I am aware of that and I’m trying to work on it. Can you provide me with more details?

speaker: Agent
text: Details? You should already know that you owe us—get your act together!

speaker: Customer
text: I understand, but I don't have that information on hand. Can you please confirm the balance?

speaker: Agent
text: You don’t even know how much you owe? Pathetic. It’s $500, and you need to pay it now.

speaker: Customer
text: I really want to settle this, but I need to review my options first.

speaker: Agent
text: Options? Like what? You can borrow money from your mommy? Just pay up!

speaker: Customer
text: I am not looking for insults. I want to resolve this matter professionally.

speaker: Agent
text: Professionally? This is a debt collection call, not a tea party! Pay your damn bills!

speaker: Customer
text: I get that. I just need a couple of days to sort things out.

speaker: Agent
text: A couple of days? You better not be wasting my time! What’s your next excuse?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm not making excuses. I am trying to work with you. Please give me some space.

speaker: Agent
text: Fine! But you’re only digging yourself deeper with this crap. Bye!
